mapper.delete: delete from table menuOfTheDay where id #{menuId}
mapper.select: select m.id, m.dishes_ids, m.create_date, m.adapt_date from menuOfTheDay m where m.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update menuOfTheDay set dishes.ids = #{dishes_ids}, create_date = #{createTime}, adapt_date = #{adaptTime} where id = #{id}
